description: The painted buckeye (Aesculus sylvatica) is an amazing plant species that delights gardeners and nature-lovers alike. In late spring, this deciduous tree puts on a stunning show of blooms in shades of white, yellow and orange that contrast beautifully with its glossy green leaves. It is a prolific producer of fruits known as buckeyes, which when dried, can be made into attractive natural decorations. Besides its attractive features, the painted buckeye is also drought-tolerant and typically free of pests and diseases, making it perfect for any landscape. A great choice for any garden, the painted buckeye is a definite thumbs-up.
